about_the_game:
HOUSE OF HORROR: OUTSIDE IS BETTER" thrusts players into a chilling first-person horror adventure, navigating a nightmarish torture facility overrun by psychiatric patients exhibiting dangerously violent behavior.

This immersive experience offers a terrifying blend of suspense, horror, and psychological dread, pushing the boundaries of survival in a place where escape seems impossible. Developed by veterans of the horror genre, this game challenges even the most hardened players.

-HISTORY:

Deep within a secretive underground facility, unspeakable horrors unfold as psychiatric patients, driven to the edge of madness, become violent and uncontrollable. Once a place of human experimentation and torment, this twisted prison has now become the stage for survival as you, Subject 117, attempt to escape its dark corridors.

You awaken with no memory of how you arrived, forced to piece together the harrowing experiments and inhumane trials conducted within the facility. As you delve deeper, you discover a malevolent force lurking behind the madness—an entity that warps reality itself. Surviving this ordeal will not only require your wits but also your sanity.

In HOUSE OF HORROR: OUTSIDE IS BETTER", every choice matters, and danger lurks behind every corner. With reality and hallucinations blending together, your only hope is to confront the grim truth behind your captivity.

-GAMEPLAY:

Use a dynamo flashlight to survive this experience or immerse yourself in it even more.

-FEATURES:

  • True Survival Horror: You are helpless—without weapons or allies, your only options are to flee, hide, and outsmart your twisted captors.

  • Psychological Terror: Experience a disturbing storyline where sanity erodes with each revelation, blending horror with mental unraveling.

  • Immersive Graphics: High-quality visuals plunge players into a grim, claustrophobic environment, heightening the tension at every turn.

  • Unpredictable Enemies: The psychiatric patients have no pattern—they may stalk you in silence or erupt into violent attacks at any moment.

  • Dark Themes: Themes of psychological abuse, torture, and madness play a prominent role, creating an unsettling atmosphere throughout the game.

-WARNING:

HOUSE OF HORROR: OUTSIDE IS BETTER" contains graphic violence, disturbing imagery, moments of nudity, and intense psychological themes. Viewer discretion is strongly advised. The game also includes scenes that may trigger photosensitivity. Any resemblance to real events or people is purely coincidental.
